sourcesContent:
import './App.css'; import React from 'react'; export default function About() { return ( <>

My name is Andrew Hungate and I maintain this website as a record of my current and past projects, interests, and experience.

I am particularly interested in educational technology and design, and want to build new solutions to help bridge continuing gaps in skill-based learning and job education. As a full-time MBA candidate at UC Berkeley Haas, I am focused on marketing, analytics, and human-centered design.

I worked in marketing for five years in the performing arts and publishing industries, but have also been involved in writing book reviews, freelance design, and tinkering with various projects in Node.js, the most recent of which is available here as the .

I grew up in Portland, OR, earned a Bachelor's in English Literature from the University of Chicago, and have lived and worked in Los Angeles, Princeton, and Philadelphia. I am currently based in Berkeley, CA.

LinkedIn

) }
